DOC.brief_summary: Treatment of chronic pelvic pain syndrome (CPPS) is challenging for patients and physicians once conventional therapies fail. We hypothesize that combined sono-electro-magnetic therapy can improve refractory CPPS in men.
DOC.brief_title: Sono-Electro-Magnetic Therapy for Refractory Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome
DOC.criteria: CPSS III symptomatic >3 months NIHCPSI total score =/>15 NIHCPSI pain =/>8 post void residual >100mL urinary tract infection urethral stricture age <18 years
